0.title: Kids loved it!
0.content: Fun little movie to watch with my little ones. Very creative concept.

1.title: My toys scare me now
1.content: The movie was great but now I can't sleep at night thinking that my toys might murder me in my sleep. Might need to see a therapist for my insomnia.

2.title: A wonderful adventure!
2.content: It was engaging and thrilling, inspired me to turn my house into a jungle! My wife and kids left me thinking I was crazy but I'm just living out the ultimate dream!

3.title: Ruins lives!
3.content: Watched it with husband and kids, now my husband is possessed and I'm filing a divorce.

4.title: Sweet and Sour
4.content: Has its moments but they're too few and far between.

5.title: Exceeded Expectations
5.content: Great movie. Pretty sweet acting. Loved it. 8/10

6.title: Slept through it
6.content: Mom took me to watch it, my insomnia is now cured.

7.title: Watch alone!
7.content: Beautiful movie but I regret watching it with my daughter, she started snoring halfway through it. Infuriating.

8.title: DO NOT WATCH THIS.
8.content: Hated the movie. Complete waste of time and money.

9.title: Would not recommend
9.content: This is the kind of movie that makes me thankful that I'm blind.

10.title: Really did feel the Heat
10.content: Watched this alone with headphones on while half my house burned down because I forgot to take the turkey out of the oven. Nice movie tho, might turn gay for the cast ;)

11.title: Masterpiece
11.content: It's a must watch. Go with family and watch this. Incredibly enjoyable.
